title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, September 12, 2019
description: Today in 1846, poets Elizabeth Barrett and Robert Browning eloped. Elizabeth’s sonnet “How do I love thee, let me count the ways” is about their love.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today in 1846, poets Elizabeth Barrett and Robert Browning eloped. Elizabeth’s sonnet “How do I love thee, let me count the ways” is about their love.
